creator: QConnex GmbH
descriptionHtml:
The perfect Klyqa experience is in your hands. Control all your Klyqa Smart Home products with this intuitive and flexible app.

Of course, you could just switch your lights on and off - but with our app you have many more possibilities. Get to know your Smart Home from scratch and discover all the features Klyqa offers:

LIGHTING SCENARIOS AND AUTOMATION
Klyqa gives you full control over your smart products. Whether you want to control each light bulb individually or in groups, whether you want to arrange them in rooms or dim each light bulb precisely, it's all in your hands. We also go one step further and offer you the possibility of automating your lighting individually. With automated routines, you can individually adjust the lighting mood to the time of day and day of the week and, therefore, mirror your personal habits. From high-energy daylight when you get up, welcome home lighting in the evening, to atmospheric dinner lighting. Quite automatic, quite smart.

COMPATIBLE WITH ALEXA AND GOOGLE
You already use a Voice Assistant and are used to the convenience of controlling your smart home with your voice? Don't worry, you don't have to do without it even with Klyqa. Our system is compatible with all common voice assistants such as Alexa and Google. You can also use Google Home to control it.

SUPER SIMPLE, SUPER SECURE
Intuitive and simple operation is as important to us as the security of your data. Our app was developed and programmed completely in Germany where the most stringent regulations exist. We give you full control of not only your smart lighting but also your data. Decide for yourself whether you want to use the app completely anonymously and without registration, or enjoy the full range of functions with a personal account. Your data is absolutely safe and will only be stored on German servers.

FULL CONTROL. AWAY FROM HOME
By creating an optional user account you can control your Klyqa Smart Home even when you’re not at home. This way you can always react or check if you have really turned off the light. If not, you know what to do - simply swipe the display. That way you save energy and money.

SMART LIGHT AND – COMING SOON - MUCH MORE
Let there be light - and much more. In the future, in addition to our smart lights, we’ll be launching other smart home products onto the market. Of course, these will also be perfectly controlled with our app and integrated into your existing Smart Home. You’ll have everything from one source and the certainty that your Smart Home harmonises perfectly. Simple, reliable and safe. That‘s Klyqa.

title: Klyqa

creator: QConnex GmbH
descriptionHtml:
The perfect Klyqa experience is in your hands. Control all your Klyqa Smart Home products with this intuitive and flexible app.

Of course, you could just switch your lights on and off - but with our app you have many more possibilities. Get to know your Smart Home from scratch and discover all the features Klyqa offers:

LIGHTING SCENARIOS AND AUTOMATION
Klyqa gives you full control over your smart products. Whether you want to control each light bulb individually or in groups, whether you want to arrange them in rooms or dim each light bulb precisely, it's all in your hands. We also go one step further and offer you the possibility of automating your lighting individually. With automated routines, you can individually adjust the lighting mood to the time of day and day of the week and, therefore, mirror your personal habits. From high-energy daylight when you get up, welcome home lighting in the evening, to atmospheric dinner lighting. Quite automatic, quite smart.

COMPATIBLE WITH ALEXA AND GOOGLE
You already use a Voice Assistant and are used to the convenience of controlling your smart home with your voice? Don't worry, you don't have to do without it even with Klyqa. Our system is compatible with all common voice assistants such as Alexa and Google. You can also use Google Home to control it.

SUPER SIMPLE, SUPER SECURE
Intuitive and simple operation is as important to us as the security of your data. Our app was developed and programmed completely in Germany where the most stringent regulations exist. We give you full control of not only your smart lighting but also your data. Decide for yourself whether you want to use the app completely anonymously and without registration, or enjoy the full range of functions with a personal account. Your data is absolutely safe and will only be stored on German servers.

FULL CONTROL. AWAY FROM HOME
By creating an optional user account you can control your Klyqa Smart Home even when you’re not at home. This way you can always react or check if you have really turned off the light. If not, you know what to do - simply swipe the display. That way you save energy and money.

SMART LIGHT AND – COMING SOON - MUCH MORE
Let there be light - and much more. In the future, in addition to our smart lights, we’ll be launching other smart home products onto the market. Of course, these will also be perfectly controlled with our app and integrated into your existing Smart Home. You’ll have everything from one source and the certainty that your Smart Home harmonises perfectly. Simple, reliable and safe. That‘s Klyqa.

descriptionHtml:
The perfect Klyqa experience is in your hands. Control all your Klyqa Smart Home products with this intuitive and flexible app.

Of course, you could just switch your lights on and off - but with our app you have many more possibilities. Get to know your Smart Home from scratch and discover all the features Klyqa offers:

LIGHTING SCENARIOS AND AUTOMATION
Klyqa gives you full control over your smart products. Whether you want to control each light bulb individually or in groups, whether you want to arrange them in rooms or dim each light bulb precisely, it's all in your hands. We also go one step further and offer you the possibility of automating your lighting individually. With automated routines, you can individually adjust the lighting mood to the time of day and day of the week and, therefore, mirror your personal habits. From high-energy daylight when you get up, welcome home lighting in the evening, to atmospheric dinner lighting. Quite automatic, quite smart.

COMPATIBLE WITH ALEXA AND GOOGLE
You already use a Voice Assistant and are used to the convenience of controlling your smart home with your voice? Don't worry, you don't have to do without it even with Klyqa. Our system is compatible with all common voice assistants such as Alexa and Google. You can also use Google Home to control it.

SUPER SIMPLE, SUPER SECURE
Intuitive and simple operation is as important to us as the security of your data. Our app was developed and programmed completely in Germany where the most stringent regulations exist. We give you full control of not only your smart lighting but also your data. Decide for yourself whether you want to use the app completely anonymously and without registration, or enjoy the full range of functions with a personal account. Your data is absolutely safe and will only be stored on German servers.

FULL CONTROL. AWAY FROM HOME
By creating an optional user account you can control your Klyqa Smart Home even when you’re not at home. This way you can always react or check if you have really turned off the light. If not, you know what to do - simply swipe the display. That way you save energy and money.

SMART LIGHT AND – COMING SOON - MUCH MORE
Let there be light - and much more. In the future, in addition to our smart lights, we’ll be launching other smart home products onto the market. Of course, these will also be perfectly controlled with our app and integrated into your existing Smart Home. You’ll have everything from one source and the certainty that your Smart Home harmonises perfectly. Simple, reliable and safe. That‘s Klyqa.
